skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I am moderately skilled in front-end development, with a solid understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I have experience creating responsive designs and integrating APIs to enhance user experiences

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I'm quite good at backend development and have a great understanding of database administration, server-side programming, and API integration.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: I am skilled in UI and UX design and development, merging technical know-how with creativity to produce visually appealing and user-friendly user interfaces.

skills.title: Social Media Managing
skills.description: I have an outstanding knowledge in object-oriented programming and software development, and I speak Java fluently.
